title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
steps: Cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
Beat eggs with Parmesan and black pepper.
Drain spaghetti and mix with pancetta and egg mixture off the heat.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato-based gravy.
steps: Marinate chicken in yogurt and tikka spice mix for 1 hour.
Sauté onion, add tomato puree, and cook until thickened.
Add cream and cooked chicken, simmer for 5 minutes.

title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
summary: Soft and chewy cookies loaded with chocolate chips.
steps: Add egg and vanilla, mix well.
Fold in flour and chocolate chips.
Scoop onto baking tray and bake for 12-15 minutes.
